title: Apple forces Coinbase to change its crypto products, says CEO
summary: Brian Armstrong has taken Apple to task over its allegedly exclusionary policies towards crypto app developers.

title: New blockchain offers minimal fees and fast transactions for DeFi apps
summary: As DeFi sends Ethereum fees to a record average of $15, a new blockchain says it can execute an identical transaction for just $0.0008.

title: Tether (USDT) Recovers 1 Million Wrongly Transferred to a Different User
summary: Paolo Ardoino, the CTO of Tether, announced that the company had recovered 1 million USDT for one of its users.

title: Instant crypto exchange plans to launch iOS app for PRO services
summary: A new iOS app being built will allow everyday consumers to buy and sell cryptocurrencies while providing traders an intuitive terminal without needing a desktop.

title: Why DeFi Isn’t Always As Decentralized As You Might Think
summary: Some DeFi platforms are more decentralized than others, while some are decentralized in different ways. Read more about this.
